document_data.name: Avoidance
document_data.mainbody: '''''Avoidance''''' was an [[arcane magic|arcane]] [[abjuration]] and [[alteration]] [[spell]] that created a strong repulsion between the target and all other living things besides the caster.
document_data.Effects:
This spell could only be used upon inanimate objects. Creatures attempting to touch the object found themselves halting before being able to do so. The magic of the spell would even violently throw creatures approaching too quickly.

The reverse of this spell, '''''attraction''''', had the opposite effect, drawing creatures toward it.
document_data.Components: In addition to [[verbal]] and [[somatic component]]s, this spell required as a [[material component]] a magnetized [[needle]] to cast.
document_data.Notable Users: [[Rial Potjian]], a guildmaster in [[Ravens Bluff]] during the 14{{th}} century [[DR]], memorized the ''avoidance'' spell.{{Cite polyhedron/88/The Living City: The Ravens Bluff Diviner's Guild|17}}
